settings.heading: Available Offers:
settings.text:
Get Extra 5% Off on Prepaid Orders. (Discount Automatically Applied on checkout, No Code Required).

FLAT200 : Get ₹200 off on order above ₹3499.

FLAT400 : Get ₹400 off on order above ₹4999.

Free Shipping on orders above ₹300.

settings.content_1:
A 15-day, no-questions-asked return and exchange policy.

Just ensure that the product is unused and all tags are intact.

Please use following link to process Return & Exchange:

https://baccabucci.clickpost.ai/return-exchange

settings.content_3:
All of our orders are delivered by our top courier partners. Most of our orders are shipped out within a day, and most deliveries happen within a couple of days. However, for J&K and the North East region, it may take 3–7 days.

Please use following link to Track your order:

https://baccabucci.clickpost.ai/

settings.content_5:
Bacca Bucci offers a warranty on its products against manufacturing defects. The warranty period and terms may vary depending on the specific product purchased. Typically, the warranty period for Bacca Bucci shoes is one month from the date of purchase.

During the warranty period, we will repair or replace the defective product at no charge, provided that the defect is not a result of normal wear and tear, misuse, or abuse of the product. The warranty does not cover accidental damage or damage caused by improper use or care of the product.

To claim warranty service, customers need to email us the order number and image of the defective product at crm@baccabucci.com. Upon receiving the package, our customer care executive will inspect the product and determine whether it is covered under warranty. If the defect is covered under warranty, we will provide a repair or replacement according to the terms of the warranty.
